index.title: Hello! here are the valid commands
description:
**gifs** - lists all loaded categories of gifs/images
**help *command** - show info about all commands or the specified command
**info *page** - shows info about créu and his friends!
**poll title, *options** - makes a poll, options may be none (yes/no) or phrases separated by a comma (up to 20), title may also be omitted if there arent other arguments
**stats** - shows some useful stats
**time *area** - use this command to see what time is it in another place

Questions, suggestions, bugs or anything else? DM leninnog#2580

Want me on your server? [click here!](https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=740006457805635678&permissions=537259072&scope=bot)

gifs.title: Gifs/Images!
description: This command lists all loaded categories of gifs/images
You may use them as a normal command, for example, %slap

info.title: Info!
description: Shows info about créu and his friends!
Use this command to see avaiable pages

poll.title: Reaction polls!
description: You may use this command with a title and up to 20 options, separated by commas, but you can also use without options, or even without a title

time.title: Timezones!
description: Timezones are weird, but my developer found an [api](http://worldtimeapi.org) I can push data all day!
You can use this command to see avaiable zones
